message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  This seems fair considering the inflation and the fact that I'm losing money faster as time goes on.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than your initial offer, but I want to be compensated for the fact that I'm losing money at a faster rate than you.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your inflation is much higher than mine. I'm offering you $45 which is a better deal than what you'll get if we wait any longer.  Take it or leave it!
